title: Crime Alert 12.09.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.09.21
description:
A man kills his wife on their first wedding anniversary. A 30-year-old woman is busted stealing from people while they are at loved-one's funerals.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
